H0.text: the world 's tallest jain statue is located in which state of india. Gujarat

H1.text: the world 's tallest jain statue is located in which state of india. Rajasthan

H2.text: the world 's tallest jain statue is located in which state of india. Madhya Pradesh

H3.text: the world 's tallest jain statue is located in which state of india. Maharashtra

A4.text: The 33-metre (108-foot) tall Statue of Ahiṃsā (depicting Rishabhanatha) was erected in the Nashik district in 2015.
